mapper.select: SELECT set_id, set_name FROM set_menu_tb ORDER BY set_id
SELECT set_id, set_name FROM set_menu_tb WHERE set_id = #{setId}

SELECT sc.component_id, sc.set_id, sc.component_type, sc.category_id, c.category_name FROM set_component_tb sc LEFT JOIN category_tb c ON sc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE sc.set_id = #{setId} ORDER BY sc.component_type

SELECT ing.ingredient_id, ing.category_id, ing.ingredient_name, ing.price, ing.image_id, c.category_name, img.img_url AS imageUrl FROM ingredient_tb ing INNER JOIN category_tb c ON ing.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN image_tb img ON ing.image_id = img.image_id WHERE ing.category_id = #{categoryId} AND c.category_type = 'ingredient' ORDER BY ing.ingredient_id
